articles.title: European recognition of Palestinian state shows US still only power that counts - BBC
articles.description: Britain and France's decision to recognise a Palestinian state is a historic moment, but it only becomes feasible with US support.
articles.content:
Tom BatemanState department correspondent, New York
France's president co-chaired the UN conference on the Question of Palestine in New York
Britain and France's recognition of a state of Palestine… [+5346 chars]
